charaepi_ch0000_80_red/2301_1201_0100_10:
Good job fending off that attack, Eevee! Now it’s
our turn!
charaepi_ch0000_80_red/2301_0402_0500_10:
Leave it to me! I have a few more tricks up
my sleeve!
charaepi_ch0000_80_red/2301_1201_0600_10:
I thought I heard some loud noises around here.
So you all were battling, huh?
charaepi_ch0000_80_red/2301_1201_0800_10:
That was a great match. I can tell you’ve both
been training your Pokémon quite a bit.
charaepi_ch0000_80_red/2301_1201_0900_10: Especially that Snorlax of yours, Red.
charaepi_ch0000_80_red/2301_1201_1000_10:
The way it was moving earlier shows you’ve been
raising it well. It’s looking great!
charaepi_ch0000_80_red/2301_1201_1200_10:
Did you know that this Snorlax is the one Red
caught on our first adventure?
charaepi_ch0000_80_red/2301_1201_1300_10:
That’s why they’re so in sync, just like Red and
Charizard! And it’s also why they’re able to pull
off those perfect combinations!
charaepi_ch0000_80_red/2301_1201_1400_10:
I mean...my teamwork with Eevee and
Venusaur is great, too!
charaepi_ch0000_80_red/2301_1201_1500_10:
One day, I know we’re gonna beat Red’s
Charizard and Snorlax!
charaepi_ch0000_80_red/2301_1201_1600_10: Until then, I’m not gonna stop challenging them!
charaepi_ch0000_80_red/2301_1201_1700_10: I see. When you say your first adventure...
charaepi_ch0000_80_red/2301_1201_1800_10:
Do you mean your travels through the
Kanto region?
charaepi_ch0000_80_red/2301_1201_1900_10:
Yup! That’s the region Blue, Red, and I
explored first!
charaepi_ch0000_80_red/2301_1201_2000_10: That’s also where Red met Snorlax!
charaepi_ch0000_80_red/2301_0401_2200_10: Well...actually, he had to wake him up first!
charaepi_ch0000_80_red/2301_0302_2300_10: Did he trade someone for Snorlax?
charaepi_ch0000_80_red/2301_0402_2400_10: Actually, it all started when Red woke him up!
charaepi_ch0000_80_red/2301_1201_2500_10: Red had to wake him up?
charaepi_ch0000_80_red/2301_1201_2600_10:
Yup! Snorlax was blocking a road while taking a
nap, so Red played a flute to wake him up!
charaepi_ch0000_80_red/2301_1201_2700_10: Then they battled, and that’s how Red caught him!
charaepi_ch0000_80_red/2301_1201_2800_10:
That happened not too long after Red first became
a Trainer, so it was a tough battle.
charaepi_ch0000_80_red/2301_1201_2900_10: It was so close, he only barely caught him!
charaepi_ch0000_80_red/2301_1201_3000_10:
What a fascinating story. I wish I’d been there to
see it.
charaepi_ch0000_80_red/2301_1201_3100_10: I imagine it was a great battle.
charaepi_ch0000_80_red/2301_1201_3200_10:
Yeah! It must’ve been fierce, because Snorlax was
so strong to begin with!
charaepi_ch0000_80_red/2301_1201_3300_10:
I was so jealous when I heard Red
caught Snorlax...
charaepi_ch0000_80_red/2301_1201_3400_10: Oh? Did you also give it a try?
charaepi_ch0000_80_red/2301_1201_3700_10:
I wasn’t strong enough to catch him at
the time.
charaepi_ch0000_80_red/2301_1201_3800_10: But that’s why I think Red’s Snorlax is so cool!
charaepi_ch0000_80_red/2301_1201_3900_10:
I see. So that loss just made you fonder of
that Snorlax, huh?
charaepi_ch0000_80_red/2301_1201_4000_10:
Exactly! And that’s why I wanna battle you
again, Red!
charaepi_ch0000_80_red/2301_1201_4100_10:
I’m sure you’re ready to go another round,
aren’t you?
